description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Prawns with Coriander Mayonnaise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ prawn,Pescatarian,BBQ,Low saturated fat,High protein,Prawn,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free
name: Grilled Prawns with Coriander Mayonnaise Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place garlic cloves, grated ginger, red chilli, chopped lemongrass, grated rind of the lime and vegetable oil in a food processor and process until finely chopped. Transfer to a glass bowl.
Remove heads from the prawns and devein, marinade prawns from mixture made in step 1 and cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Preheat the BBQ grill on medium-high heat
Meanwhile, stir juice from lime, and chopped coriander into mayonnaise. Thread onto bamboo skewers (see tip).
Cook on BBQ grill for 5 minutes, turning until cooked through. Serve prawns with coriander mayonnaise.
